return {payload:{pld: msg.payload}};

name: 协议转换

主题

tosmato协议转换
致尚窗帘
func:
msg.params = [
        {
            tolerance: 20,
            excess: 0,
            atleast: true,                              
            MSBfirst: true,
            step: 1,
            use_bits: false,

            nbits:80,  
            headermark: 2600,
            headerspace: 2600,
            onemark: 1300,   
            onespace: 1300, 
            zeromark: 650,  
            zerospace: 650, 
            footermark: 0,
            footerspace: 0,
            lastspace: 0
        },
        {
            tolerance: 20,
            excess: 0,
            atleast: true,                              
            MSBfirst: true,
            step: 1,
            use_bits: true,

            nbits:2,  
            headermark: 0,
            headerspace: 0,
            onemark: 1300,   
            onespace: 1300, 
            zeromark: 650,  
            zerospace: 650, 
            footermark: 0,
            footerspace: 0,
            lastspace: 0
        }
    ]
return msg;

name: 致尚窗帘
func:
msg.params = [
        {
            tolerance: 20,
            excess: 0,
            atleast: true,                              
            MSBfirst: true,
            step: 1,
            use_bits: false,

            nbits:80,  
            headermark: 2600,
            headerspace: 2600,
            onemark: 1300,   
            onespace: 1300, 
            zeromark: 650,  
            zerospace: 650, 
            footermark: 0,
            footerspace: 0,
            lastspace: 0
        },
        {
            tolerance: 20,
            excess: 0,
            atleast: true,                              
            MSBfirst: true,
            step: 1,
            use_bits: true,

            nbits:2,  
            headermark: 0,
            headerspace: 0,
            onemark: 1300,   
            onespace: 1300, 
            zeromark: 650,  
            zerospace: 650, 
            footermark: 0,
            footerspace: 0,
            lastspace: 0
        }
    ]
return msg;

if (msg.payload.hd.cmd = 1 && msg.payload.hd.stp == 0 && msg.payload.hd.did == global.get("cmdgate") )
    return msg;
